name: Aave Interest bearing LINK
description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

en.description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

fr.description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

es.description: Aave LINK es un token que genera intereses acuñado en el momento del depósito y quemado cuando se canjea. El aLINK está vinculado 1:1 al valor del LINK subyacente que se deposita en el protocolo Aave.

de.description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

pt.description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

el.description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

tr.description: Aave LINK, mevduat üzerine basılan ve itfa edildiğinde yakılan faiz getiren bir jetondur. aLINK, Aave protokolünde depolanan temeldeki LINK değerine 1'e 1 sabitlenir.

vi.description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.

zh.description: Aave LINK 是个自生息代币，它在存款时铸造而在取款时销毁。aLINK 锚定的是 LINK 存入 Aave 之后的价值。

hi.description: Aave LINK एक ब्याज वाला टोकन है जिसे जमा करने पर ढाला जाता है और भुनाए जाने पर जला दिया जाता है। aLINK को Aave प्रोटोकॉल में जमा किए गए अंतर्निहित LINK के मूल्य के लिए 1:1 आंका गया है।

ja.description: Aave LINK is an interest bearing token minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. The aLINK is pegged 1:1 to the value of the underlying LINK that is deposited in Aave protocol.
